nodes.text: Lady VenHalgon was the wife of the aristocrat Sargo VenHalgon and she lived with him in Cinnagar. During the Clone Wars, they went on vacation to the Cularin system and stayed aboard the Cularin Star Tours yacht Twilight's Kiss. Her husband landed it in the jungle on Cularin and went off hunting along with Minister Cannison and Professor Worrita. After they failed to return, VenHalgon went off to look for them, along with Mrs. Cannison and Mrs. Worrita. They also got lost, but were found by some Tarasin. They took the women to where their husbands were and VenHalgon berated her husband for leaving the ship so ill-prepared.
